text: Saint Irenaeus (130 AD - 202) was a Roman Catholic Bishop of Lyon, France. He is a Church Father. He is known for his Christian writings. He is remembered on the 28 June. ==Other websites== *Against Heresies *St. Irenaeus at the Catholic Encyclopedia Category:Christian saints Category:130 births Category:202 deaths Category:French Roman Catholic bishops Category:Writers from Lyon
title: Irenaeus
